title: Ponguru - a ball game for wear
summary: A fun and challenging ball game for Android wear.
description: Ponguru - a fun and challenging ball game for Android wear.Use your wrist (accelerometer) to control the ball and hit the targets.Don't go out of bounds or let the clock stop!4 different game modes.    Countdown - a fight against time    Speed Ball - Boundaries transport    Cabin Fever - Don't go out of bounds or let the clock run out!    Close Quarters - Don't go out of bounds!This Android wear game is a fun wrist game. Play it while you wait in line, in class, at night, on the beach...anywhere.No wifi connection needed for this ball game.
descriptionHTML:
Ponguru - a fun and challenging ball game for Android wear.

Use your wrist (accelerometer) to control the ball and hit the targets.

Don't go out of bounds or let the clock stop!

4 different game modes.
Countdown - a fight against time
Speed Ball - Boundaries transport
Cabin Fever - Don't go out of bounds or let the clock run out!
Close Quarters - Don't go out of bounds!


This Android wear game is a fun wrist game. Play it while you wait in line, in class, at night, on the beach...anywhere.
No wifi connection needed for this ball game.
comments: It was awesome It works perfectly. Well most of the time
Its Crap, The Game Is Uncontrollable And Each Second Game The Creator Forces You To Give Him Money. Screw You.
